mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ChargingFaultRecord ( cFRe_UsingMachineCode, cFRe_EphNo, cFRe_ElectricPileID, cFRe_ElectricPileName, cFRe_ChargingSarttime, cFRe_FaultCause, cFRe_Createdate, cFRe_Updatedate, cFRe_TransactionNumber )values ( #{cfreUsingmachinecode}, #{cFRe_EphNo}, #{cfreElectricpileid}, #{cfreElectricpilename}, #{cfreChargingsarttime}, #{cfreFaultcause}, #{cfreCreatedate}, #{cfreUpdatedate}, #{cfreTransactionnumber} )
mapper.update: update tbl_ChargingFaultRecord set cFRe_UsingMachineCode=#{cfreUsingmachinecode}, cFRe_ElectricPileID=#{cfreElectricpileid}, cFRe_ElectricPileName=#{cfreElectricpilename}, cFRe_ChargingSarttime=#{cfreChargingsarttime}, cFRe_FaultCause=#{cfreFaultcause}, cFRe_Createdate=#{cfreCreatedate}, cFRe_Updatedate=#{cfreUpdatedate}, cFRe_TransactionNumber=#{cfreTransactionnumber} where pk_ChargingFaultRecord=#{pkChargingfaultrecord}
mapper.select: select pk_ChargingFaultRecord, cFRe_UsingMachineCode, cFRe_ElectricPileID, cFRe_ElectricPileName, cFRe_ChargingSarttime, cFRe_FaultCause, cFRe_Createdate, cFRe_Updatedate, cFRe_TransactionNumber from tbl_ChargingFaultRecord where pk_ChargingFaultRecord=#{pkChargingfaultrecord}

select pk_ChargingFaultRecord, cFRe_UsingMachineCode, cFRe_ElectricPileID, cFRe_ElectricPileName, cFRe_ChargingSarttime, cFRe_FaultCause, cFRe_Createdate, cFRe_Updatedate, cFRe_TransactionNumber from tbl_ChargingFaultRecord where pk_ChargingFaultRecord=#{pkChargingfaultrecord}
